title: YouTube Video Analysis Results
description: Comprehensive analysis results from YouTube video processed with Google Gemini AI

video_url.title: Video URL
video_url.description: The original YouTube video URL that was analyzed

comprehensive_summary.title: Comprehensive Summary
comprehensive_summary.description: Detailed analysis including main content, participants, topics, recommendations, data points, and overall tone of the video
comprehensive_summary.example: This video features a business consultation where the main speaker discusses digital marketing strategies. Key participants include the consultant and client. Main topics covered include SEO optimization, content marketing, and social media strategy...

key_quotes_insights.title: Key Quotes and Insights
key_quotes_insights.description: Most important quotes, valuable business advice, problems and solutions discussed, and specific strategies or frameworks mentioned
key_quotes_insights.example: Key quotes: 'Content is king, but distribution is queen' - Main business advice: Focus on customer retention over acquisition. Problems discussed: Low conversion rates. Solutions: Implement A/B testing and personalization...

video_structure_analysis.title: Video Structure Analysis
video_structure_analysis.description: Analysis of video type, length, flow, organization, and distinct sections covered
video_structure_analysis.example: Video type: Business consultation interview. Length: Approximately 45 minutes. Flow: Introduction (0-5 min), Problem identification (5-20 min), Solution discussion (20-40 min), Action items (40-45 min)...

file_id.title: Gemini File ID
file_id.description: The Google Gemini file identifier for the uploaded video file
